original_text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing every sickness and every disease among the people.
korean_text: 예수께서 모든 도시와 마을에 두루 다니사 그들의 회당에서 가르치시며 천국 복음을 전파하시며 모든 병과 모든 약한 것을 고치시니라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages
and preaching the gospel of the kingdom
and healing every sickness and every disease
